H0.text: Where was the final of the 1999 Rugby World Cup held. England

H1.text: Where was the final of the 1999 Rugby World Cup held. Australia

H2.text: Where was the final of the 1999 Rugby World Cup held. South Africa

H3.text: Where was the final of the 1999 Rugby World Cup held. Cyrmu

A4.text: It was played at the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff, Wales, on 6 November 1999

A5.text: Australia won the game by 35 points to 12, and with it, their second World Cup, having also won the 1991 tournament in England

A6.text: The Millennium Stadium was constructed in 1999 specifically for the 1999 Rugby World Cup

A7.text: The Wales national rugby and football teams play their international matches at the Millennium Stadium
